name: ListApplicationFeedback
description:
Retrieve interview feedback and scorecards for applications.

This tool retrieves all interview scorecards and feedback submissions associated with a specific application, including form structure, submitted responses, and interview context. Useful for assessing candidate performance through submitted feedback.

parameters.name: application_feedback_request_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the necessary data for retrieving application feedback and scorecards. Include specific application identifiers and any additional parameters required by the endpoint.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
